description:
RealSimpleEDU.com brings you on-the-go learning and reference for Statistics

App offers quizzes and tutorials  to help you learn Statistics

App is continuously updated based on your feedback.Your 100% satisfaction is guaranteed.

App Tools include search .



Includes following tutorials:

Introduction,
Measures of Central Tendency,
Variance and Standard Deviation,
Distribution Shape,
Probability,
Discrete Probability,
Continuous Probability,
Sampling Distribution,
Permutation and Combination,
Hypothesis Testing,
T Statistics,
Correlation and Regression,
Data Collection,
Tables and Charts,
Bar Graphs,
Line and Circle Graphs.


Includes following quizzes:

Quiz on Central Tendency,
Quiz on Probability,
Quiz on Permutation and Combination,
Quiz on Tables, Chart and Graphs.


Our Vision: Provide on-the-go references that enable our customers to refer, learn and remember; easy to learn, more engaging and most complete.

Our Mission: A RealSimpleEDU app in every pocket.

Please write to us. We would love to improve this app.
